level.heading: Rating organization.
level.text: A captive insurer shall not be required to join a rating organization.

level.heading: Effect of amendments
level.text: The 2015 amendment by D.C. Law 20-203 substituted “shall not be” for “shall not.”

level.heading: Emergency legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 19 of Captive Insurance Company Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-640, November 30, 2004, 52 DCR 1238).
